mapper.insert: /* 리뷰 등록 후 포인트 내역 추가 */ INSERT INTO tb_pt_point_accumulation_details (Point_details_code ,user_id_code ,point_standard_details_code ,point_amount ,user_email ,point_history_reg_date ) VALUES ((SELECT CONCAT('padc0',MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(pa.Point_details_code,5)AS UNSIGNED)+1)) FROM tb_pt_point_accumulation_details AS pa) ,#{userIdCode} ,'pac_details02' ,(SELECT pr.point_save_reg_review FROM tb_pt_point_accumulation_details AS pp INNER JOIN tb_pt_point_review_save_by_grade AS pr ON pp.point_standard_details_code = pr.point_standard_details_code WHERE pp.user_id_code = #{userIdCode} LIMIT 1) ,'hun@ksmart.or.kr' ,CURDATE() );

mapper.select: /* 관리자 페이지 포인트 적립 기준 조회 */ SELECT pb.point_buy_save_standard_grade_code AS pointBuySaveStandardGradeCode ,ur.grade_user_code AS gradeUserCode ,pp.point_standard_details_code AS pointStandardDetailsCode ,pp.point_standard_details_name AS pointStandardDetailsName ,ur.grade_name AS gradeName ,CONCAT(SUBSTRING(pb.point_save_by_grade_percent,3,2),+'%') AS pointSaveByGradePercent ,pb.point_save_by_grade_unit AS pointSaveByGradeUnit FROM tb_pt_point_buy_save_by_grade AS pb INNER JOIN tb_u_user_rating_standard AS ur ON pb.grade_user_code = ur.grade_user_code INNER JOIN tb_pt_point_standard_details AS pp ON pb.point_standard_details_code = pp.point_standard_details_code;

/* 관리자 페이지 날짜 별 결제 내역 조회 */ SELECT pd.point_standard_details_code AS pointStandardDetailsCode ,pa.point_details_code AS pointDetailsCode ,pa.point_history_reg_date AS pointHistoryRegDate ,pa.user_id_code AS userIdCode ,pd.point_standard_name AS pointStandardName ,pd.point_standard_details_name AS pointStandardDetailsName ,pa.point_amount AS pointAmount FROM tb_pt_point_standard_details AS pd INNER JOIN tb_pt_point_accumulation_details AS pa ON pd.point_standard_details_code = pa.point_standard_details_code; WHERE pa.point_history_reg_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}

/* 관리자 페이지 포인트 내역 조회 */ SELECT pd.point_standard_details_code AS pointStandardDetailsCode ,pa.point_details_code AS pointDetailsCode ,pa.point_history_reg_date AS pointHistoryRegDate ,pa.user_id_code AS userIdCode ,pd.point_standard_name AS pointStandardName ,pd.point_standard_details_name AS pointStandardDetailsName ,pa.point_amount AS pointAmount FROM tb_pt_point_standard_details AS pd INNER JOIN tb_pt_point_accumulation_details AS pa ON pd.point_standard_details_code = pa.point_standard_details_code;
